name: Can I, Can I?
description: Bruce Blud needs to open a can of beans.
Bring him the legendary Axe of Archaea.
intro: I got my favorite kind of beans here, but the tab
snapped off!  Be a dear and bring me something to
help open this.  The legendary Axe of Archaea
finish: That ... That's perfect!  You found it!
Gimme gimme gimme!  Oh can, you are SO OPEN!
